pages.md:
# Manual Focus

Adjust focus manually.

1. Select **MANUAL FOCUS** for !AF/MF **AF/MF SETTING > FOCUS MODE**.

   !Focus Mode Display

2. Focus manually using the lens focus ring. Rotate the ring left to reduce the focus distance, right to increase.

   !Lens Focus Ring

3. Take pictures.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**
> - Use !Button/Dial Setting **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > LENS ZOOM/FOCUS SETTING** to reverse the direction of rotation of the focus ring.
> - Regardless of the option selected, manual focus will be used when the lens is in manual focus mode.
